text: Debra Paget (born Debralee Griffin August 19, 1933) is an American actress. She acts in both movies and television. She played Cathy Reno in Love Me Tender. She also played Lily Becker in Stars and Stripes Forever. Paget was born in Denver, Colorado. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Denver Category:1933 births Category:Living people
title: Debra Paget
